description: This super green frittata is a great way to get your veggies in for breakfast.
name: Broccoli, Leek & Kale Frittata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170°C/150°C fan-forced. In a large ovenproof pan on a medium high heat, fry the leeks in the oil for 2-3 minutes until softened, add the kale, broccoli florets and grated stalk with a teaspoon of water and cook for 5-6 minutes until the broccoli is tender and the kale is wilted.
Add the lemon juice and parsley and cook for 1 minute. Reduce the heat, pour over the beaten eggs and stir to combine. Cook for 5 minutes until nearly set.
Crumble over the feta and place in the oven for 10-15 minutes until golden and bubbling.
Serve with plenty of cracked black pepper and more chopped parsley on top.
